text:
Nice!
So if you have disabled the store you may end up with functionality loss of the
printers cause you won't be able to install that PSA?
This has potential backfiring capacity imho.
The security part on the other hand is not a bad idea though. 
Markus 
Am 13/12/2023 um 21:53 schrieb 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement:
%40univie.ac.at

Sie erhalten nicht oft eine E-Mail von markus.klocker@univie.ac.at. Erfahren
Sie, warum dies wichtig ist [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]

So if you have disabled the store you may end up with functionality loss of the

This has potential backfiring capacity imho.
The security part on the other hand is not a bad idea though. 
Markus
